App Name: Raft Survival: Ocean Nomad

App Package Name: ocean.nomad.survival.simulator

Brief: Embark on an epic oceanic adventure with 'Raft Survival: Ocean Nomad'‚Äîa thrilling survival simulator that pits you against the endless blue expanse. Armed with your wits and a hook, fight to stay alive among sharks and desolate islands. With realistic 3D graphics and intuitive raft-building mechanics, Ocean Nomad delivers a harrowing experience of survival where every choice can mean the difference between life and death.
